mosinstall.name: hwdRecommend
mosinstall.author: David Horsfall
mosinstall.description: Joomla 1.0 module to allow your Joomla! users to recommend the current page to a friend.

param.name: mod_width
param.label: Module Width
param.description: The width of the module in pixels (300px) or percent (75%)

param.name: mod_bgcolor
param.label: Background Color
param.description: The color of the module background in hexidecimal format without preceding # (eg 333333)

param.name: mod_fontcolor
param.label: Font Color
param.description: The color of the module font in hexidecimal format without preceding # (eg ffffff)

param.name: mod_fonttitlesize
param.label: Title Font Size
param.description: The size of the title font in percent (100%) or pixels (12px)

param.name: mod_fontbodysize
param.label: Body Font Size
param.description: The size of the body font in percent (80%) or pixels (10px)

param.name: roundradius
param.label: Corner Radius
param.description: The radius of the rounded corners in pixels (e.g. 6 pixels)

param.name: toogle_text
param.label: Form Title
param.description: The text that appears above the form which is used to show/hide the recommend form.

param.name: show_form
param.label: Show/Hide Form Onload
param.description: Show or hide the recommend form when the page loads?

param.name: form_orientation
param.label: Recommend Form Orientation
param.description: Choose the orientation layout for your form.

param.name: personal_message
param.label: Allow Peronsal Message?
param.description: Can users send a personal message with their page recommendation?

param.name: from_address
param.label: From Email Address
param.description: Should the email be send from the user or the website webmaster?

param.name: show_copyright
param.label: Show/Hide Copyright
param.description: Do you want to show the small Highwood Design copyright notice?

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable). this allows individual module styling.
